DataElement.preferredName: Tobacco Use 100 Cigarette Smoking Indicator Code
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Coded value representing whether a person has smoked at least 100 cigarettes during his life.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Tobacco Use 100 Cigarette Tobacco Smoking Code
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Use of tobacco in any form i.e. smoking, chewing or sniffing._A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.:Finely cut tobacco encased in a wrapper of thin paper and rolled for smoking.:The act of puffing and/or inhaling smoke from a lit cigarette, cigar, or pipe.:A symbol or combination of symbols which is given an arbitrary meaning within a systematized collection of concepts used for data representation.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Use of tobacco in any form i.e. smoking, chewing or sniffing.

Concepts.definition: Use of tobacco in any form, e.g., smoking, chewing or sniffing.

Property.preferredDefinition: A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.:Finely cut tobacco encased in a wrapper of thin paper and rolled for smoking.:The act of puffing and/or inhaling smoke from a lit cigarette, cigar, or pipe.:A symbol or combination of symbols which is given an arbitrary meaning within a systematized collection of concepts used for data representation.

Concepts.definition: A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
Finely cut tobacco encased in a wrapper of thin paper and rolled for smoking.
The act of puffing and/or inhaling smoke from a lit cigarette, cigar, or pipe.
A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: An organizational header for concepts representing mostly abstract entities.
